conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway (extruded walls with thickness, angled perspective, interior visible). However, it does not preserve the 2D plan’s layout/space program.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Skipped due to automatic rejection (major space loss vs 2D plan).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Skipped due to automatic rejection (more than half of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are not represented).

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the 2D plan’s spaces are missing or not clearly represented in the 3D model (e.g., multiple toilets/baths, balconies/deck, utility, lobby/office/maid room).
Overall room configuration/adjoinments do not match the 2D plan; the 3D appears to be a simplified/generic layout rather than a faithful geometric transformation.

summary: A genuine 3D cutaway is shown, but the generated model omits most rooms and does not faithfully match the 2D floor plan layout, triggering automatic rejection.
